definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The site must be levelled before it is built upon.
sentences.chinese: 建房前要先把地基墊平。

sentences.english: Use of concrete pumping construction, pipeline installation to be straight and flat pad.
sentences.chinese: 砼採用泵送施工，管道安裝要順直，並墊平。
